name: Gong Revenue Intelligence
description: Integrate with Gong Revenue Intelligence to list, get, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Calls
tools.description: List calls from Gong. Filter by date range, user, or workspace. Returns call titles, durations, and participants.

tools.name: Get Call
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Gong call, including participants, duration, and media.

tools.name: Get Call Transcript
tools.description: Get the transcript of a specific Gong call. Returns speaker-attributed text with timestamps.

tools.name: List Users
tools.description: List users in your Gong workspace. Returns user names, emails, and statuses.

tools.name: Search Calls
tools.description: Search Gong calls by keywords, speaker, or content. Returns matching calls with relevance.
